name: Railrogue
description:
HELP WANTED!

Seeking qualified adventurer to build a railroad for Jelly Village through the treacherous Mt. Danger. Must bring own spells and/or weapons. Compensation provided in the form of whatever treasure you find inside. 

*Jelly Village not responsible for death and/or dismemberment that may occur in process of building railroad.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move around
  • Space bar to select in menus
  • Hover mouse over enemies, items, etc for descriptions

Tips

  • Press fullscreen!
  • Most items can't be picked up by you, only by the train!
  • If you accidentally block yourself off from the level exit, you'll automatically use one of your Portal Scrolls - if you still have one!

Credits
